mapper.select: SELECT c.cpostNo, c.cpostType, u.userNo, TO_CHAR(c.regDate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as regDate, c.cpostTitle, c.cpostContent, c.liked FROM communitypost c join users u ON c.userNo = u.userNo where c.cpostType = 1
select cpostTitle,TO_CHAR(regDate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as regDate,liked from ( select * from communitypost where cposttype = 1 order by liked desc ) where rownum <= 10
